pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Sequences of Events // Pierre, J. S. and Kasper, C.,(1990), "The Design of Ethological Flow-Charts on Factorial Analysis Representations - an Application to the Study of the Male Mole-Cricket Sexual Courtship." Biology of Behaviour 15(3-4): 125-151.(in french). Includes the calculation of transition matrices, their manipulation (symmetrization and diagonal loading), their analysis by CA (Correspondence Analysis), their comparison by likelihood ratio tests, the graphic plot of flow charts on the factorial axes of the CA.
